author: dkhaywood
msg: moved the guts of tested-impl into new embedded project, that doesn't have any dependency on framework, only on metamodel

author: dkhaywood
msg: added isValid(Object) and validate(Object) to AbstractContainedObject & DomainObjectContainer; renamed isPersistable and isPersistableResult (in NakedObjectSpecification) to isValid and isValidResult (to be consistent with ObjectValidityContext which was earlier renamed from ObjectPersistContext); also fixed Memento to also support standalone NakedObject adapters whose Oid is null (though didn't write any tests, sorry)
